name: self-zunda
description: ずんだもんのDiscord Bot なのだ！

scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run check && npm run test
scripts.generate-voicevox-types: curl -s http://localhost:50021/openapi.json -o voicevox_openapi.json && npx openapi-typescript voicevox_openapi.json -o src/types/voicevox.ts
scripts.generate-voicevox-types:custom: curl -s $VOICEVOX_URL/openapi.json -o voicevox_openapi.json && npx openapi-typescript voicevox_openapi.json -o src/types/voicevox.ts
scripts.generate-voicevox-client: curl -s http://localhost:50021/openapi.json -o voicevox_openapi.json && npx openapi-typescript-codegen --input voicevox_openapi.json --output src/api/voicevox --client axios
scripts.generate-voicevox-client:custom: curl -s $VOICEVOX_URL/openapi.json -o voicevox_openapi.json && npx openapi-typescript-codegen --input voicevox_openapi.json --output src/api/voicevox --client axios
